Hodges is the club's all-time appearance record holder and eighth on the all-time goalscoring record list. He was a member of the Argyle squad which reached the semi-finals of the FA Cup in 1984.The FA Cup Run Greens on Screen. Retrieved 9 February 2010. His best campaign came in the 1985–86 season under Dave Smith when the club won promotion from the Third Division. Hodges started in all 46 matches and scored 16 goals, an impressive return for a midfielder.Kevin Hodges Greens on Screen. Retrieved 9 February 2010. In recognition of his performances that year, he won the club's Player of the Year award.
